FuncDef:
The twamp reflector spec-expand enable command expands the TWAMP session specifications on a Session-Reflector. Namely, this command configures a Session-Reflector to work in specification expansion mode.
The undo twamp reflector spec-expand enable command cancels the specification expansion configuration. Namely, a Session-Reflector switches from the specification expansion mode to the original mode.
By default, the function of expanding the TWAMP session specifications on a Session-Reflector id disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To expand the TWAMP session specifications on a Session-Reflector to 2048 per board and 16348 per device, run the twamp reflector spec-expand enable command in the system view.
Precautions
If you run the twamp reflector spec-expand enable command or its undo form to switch between the specification expansion mode and the original mode for ongoing test instances, the statistics collected using these instances will be incorrect, and packet loss may occur in some test intervals.
